snippet.title: MLB The Show 24 - Legends Trailer
snippet.description:
From historic hitters to present-day pitchers #MLBTheShow 24 features over 190 new and returning Legends players.

The only question you need to ask yourself is…Who are you showing off in your lineup?


Pre-Order Now: https://mlbthe.show/1c94a7


#UnlockGreatness #OwnTheShow
